initPoints.description: Singleton ObjectBox store with lazy initialization using double-check locking. Thread-safe initialization via AtomicReference.
Hilt DI module that provides singleton BoxStore by delegating to ObxStore.get()
Legacy v1 singleton ObjectBox store with lazy initialization

notes: The main store initialization in v2 is in core/persistence/obx/ObxStore.kt
Hilt DI is used to provide the BoxStore as a singleton via ObxStoreModule
MyObjectBox is a generated class by ObjectBox annotation processor
The store is initialized lazily on first access
Both v1 (legacy) and v2 implementations use the same initialization pattern
